description: Can you say YEEHAW!? Well, strap on your boots troops 'cause Jacob is gonna take you on an intense ride in this first solo performance as he tells us his love for the outdoors, horses and other things. This all-American red-blooded Marine is bound and determined he's gonna be a big star and he'll certainly shine in your sky in this scene as he pulls off his belt and spanks his ass with it. But the belt fun doesn't stop there. Jacob takes his belt, wraps it around his hard cock and uses it to jerk himself. By the time he's done, he's sweating and you will be too. Jacob is a ton of fun so don't miss this one!
title: Jacob, Scene #01
